proofassistant

Class NDLine

  • java.lang.Object
    • proofassistant.NDLine

  • public class NDLine
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a line in a natural deduction proof
    Since:
    Proof Assistant 0.1

      • NDLine

        public NDLine(java.lang.String macro,
              int type)
        Create a new NDLine and set its type.
        Parameters:
        macro - The TeX code of the line to create
        type - The type of line to create

      • NDLine

        public NDLine(java.lang.String macro)
        Create a new NDLine of type 0
        Parameters:
        macro - The TeX code of the line to create

      • NDLine

        public NDLine(java.lang.String macro,
              boolean incrementLine)
        Create a new NDLine of type 0 and choose whether or not to increment the Globals line numbers.
        Parameters:
        macro - The TeX code of the line to create
        incrementLine - true - increment Globals line numbers, false - doe not increment Globals line numbers.

      • NDLine

        public NDLine(int type)
        Create a new NDLine of type 5!
        Parameters:
        type - MUST BE 5! 5 I SAY!

      • NDLine

        public NDLine(java.lang.String macro,
              int type,
              boolean incrementLine)
        Create a new NDLine, set its type and choose whether or not to increment the Globals line numbers.
        Parameters:
        macro - The TeX code of the line to create
        type - The type of line to create
        incrementLine - true - increment Globals line numbers, false - doe not increment Globals line numbers.

      • NDLine

        public NDLine(java.lang.String macro,
              int type,
              int lineNum)
        Create a new NDLine, set its type and line number.
        Parameters:
        macro - The TeX code of the line to create
        type - The type of line to create
        lineNum - The line number to create the line with

      • NDLine

        public NDLine(java.lang.String macro,
              int type,
              java.lang.String specialLineNum)
        Create a new NDLine, set its type and set a specialLineNum.
        Parameters:
        macro - The TeX code of the line to create
        type - The type of line to create (you probably want 11 - axiom)
        specialLineNum - The special line number to use

      • replace

        public static java.lang.String replace(java.lang.String substance,
                                       java.lang.String phrase,
                                       java.lang.String replacement)
        Replaces all instances of phrase in substance with replacement, ignoring TeX commands If substance = "hello", phrase="l" and replacement="p", the output will be "heppo".
        Parameters:
        substance - The string to apply substitutions to
        phrase - The string in substance to be replaced
        replacement - The string to replace phrase with
        Returns:
